attributes.action: Turn the  UK into a noiseless firework Country please.
attributes.additional_details:
These loud banger type fireworks affect ASD children, who have very sensitive hearing that actually  hurt their ears when they go off unexpectedly, 
terrifying them causing them great anxiety and also small children too.
It also affects animals badly  where they either run off or turn into a dribbling mess.
People really are fed up of these loud bangers and the government really need to change the law to noiseless firework or banning them completely.
attributes.background: Create a law that only noiseless fireworks are used in the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
